text.emotional: Anyway, to circle back - did you know that pigs, and I mean the humans born in the year of the pig, are supposed to be a little bit gullible?
text.silence: {.} anyway {.} to circle back {...} did you know that pigs {....} and i mean {.} the humans born in the year of the pig {....} are supposed to be a {...} little bit gullible {..}
